tagblock.name: Sound Classes

int16.name: Maximum Sounds Per Tag
int16.tooltip: [1,16] maximum number of sounds playing per individual sound tag

int16.name: Maximum Sounds Per Object Per Tag
int16.tooltip: [1,16] maximum number of sounds per individual sound tag playing on an object

int16.name: Maximum Sounds Per Class
int16.tooltip: [0,16] maximum number of sounds playing of this class. zero means ignore.

int16.name: Maximum Sounds Per Object Per Class
int16.tooltip: [0,16] maximum number of sounds of this class playing on an object. zero means ignore.

int32.name: Preemption Time
int32.tooltip: replaces other instances after this many milliseconds

float32.name: Air Reverb Gain
float32.tooltip: how much reverb applies to this sound class

float32.name: Air Direct Path Gain
float32.tooltip: how much goes to direct path (dry)

float32.name: Underwater Reverb Gain
float32.tooltip: how much reverb applies to this sound class

float32.name: Underwater Direct Path Gain
float32.tooltip: how much goes to direct path (dry)

tagblock.comment: these settings vary how the sound fades as you move closer or further away from it.

float32.name: Don't Obstruct Distance
float32.tooltip: don't obstruct below this distance

float32.name: Don't Play Distance
float32.tooltip: don't play below this distance

float32.name: Attack Distance
float32.tooltip: start playing at full volume at this distance

float32.name: Minimum Distance
float32.tooltip: start attenuating at this distance

float32.name: Sustain Begin Distance
float32.tooltip: set attenuation to sustain db at this distance

float32.name: Sustain End Distance
float32.tooltip: continue attenuating to silence at this distance

float32.name: Maximum Distance
float32.tooltip: the distance beyond which this sound is no longer audible

float32.name: Sustain dB
float32.tooltip: the amount of attenuation between sustain begin and end

float32.name: Equipment Lowpass
float32.tooltip: sets the lowpass wet mix when an equiment is active

float32.name: Environment Forced Lowpass
float32.tooltip: sets the lowpass wet mix when an environment forced lowpass is active

float32.name: Effect Lowpass
float32.tooltip: sets the lowpass wet mix when a lowpass effect is active

float32.name: Cutscene Ducking Sustain Time
float32.tooltip: how long this lasts after the cutscene ends

float32.name: Scripted Dialog Ducking Fade In Time
Scripted Dialog Ducking Sustain Time
float32.tooltip: how long this lasts after the scripted dialog ends

float32.name: Scripted Dialog Ducking Fade Out Time
Equipment Channel Ducking Fade In Time
Equipment Channel Ducking Sustain Time
float32.tooltip: how long this lasts after the equipment is turned off

float32.name: Equipment Channel Ducking Fade Out Time
Between Rounds Ducking Fade In Time
Between Rounds Ducking Sustain Time
float32.tooltip: how long this lasts after we get back in the game

float32.name: Between Rounds Ducking Fade Out Time
Transmission Interpolation Time
float32.tooltip: default is 0.5 seconds

float32.name: Send To LFE Gain
float32.tooltip: When send (mono) to lfe is set, this is how much additional gain to apply

int32.name: Minimum Facial Animation Delay
int32.tooltip: setting this forces sounds of this class to be delayed while the facial animation resource loads.

int32.name: Maximum Facial Animation Delay
int32.tooltip: setting this allows sounds of this class to be delayed while the facial animation resource loads.

int32.name: Maximum Facial Animation Blend
int32.tooltip: setting this makes sounds blends in facial animation (will cut off at maximum facial animation delay).
